name: Alien Breakers
description: A game I made for a game jam hosted by my campus's game development club, the theme was "Projection", the following of the theme is a little bit of a stretch as I chose to keep the graphics/sprites with a color palette as if they were "projected" on a game boy screen (so tons of greens). But honestly I'm satisfied with the end result, it's not prefect but I think for my first proper game I think it gets the job done.
